detail_desc: Small handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles with metal details at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a tab with a press-stud at the top. Three-part compartment with a zipped middle compartment, and studs on the base. Size 11.5x26x29.5 cm.
Cotton sun hat. Lined.

Fitted corset top in stretch twill with a heart-shaped neckline and decorative, sewn-in lacing at the front. Silicone trim at the top to hold the top in place and a visible zip at the back.
Nightslip in pima cotton jersey with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend in a relaxed, straight fit with long sleeves.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend in a relaxed, straight fit with long sleeves.

Slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y). Zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Short, double-breasted kimono in patterned satin with notch lapels and concealed press-studs at the front. Long sleeves with wide cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Top in a sturdy weave with a crinkled finish, long sleeves with decorative gathers and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and off-centre fastening with concealed press-studs at the top. Seam at the waist and straight-cut skirt with side pockets and a sewn-in wrapover front. Long sleeves with flared cuffs with concealed press-studs, a concealed zip in one side and contrasting colour trims. Unlined.

Wide satin shirt in a slightly shorter style with embroidered appliqués. Notch lapels, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Sleeveless dress in burnout-patterned jersey with a round neck, visible seams front and back and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Knee-length nursing dress in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature, 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative ties and a flounce to the hem. Unlined. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Knee-length nursing dress in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature, 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative ties and a flounce to the hem. Unlined. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
